Title: Requires charter schools to conduct periodic testing of potable water systems for lead contamination
Summary: Requires charter schools to conduct periodic testing of potable water systems for lead contamination; requires that initial testing of such potable water systems occurs between 1/1/20 and 12/31/21 and such systems are re-tested every 5 years thereafter.
LawCode: Amd ยง1110, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring charter schools to conduct periodic testing of potable water systems for lead contamination
